text: Iadɨ 16.15 Lom 16.5, 1 Ko 1.16 isagali imahali me namɨlaŋ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali Sɨtefanasɨ dɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ igɨlalaŋ uami. Nɨbɨlaŋ Akaia fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ uami. Nulɨdɨ mɨse avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi uami. Mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨci hulaŋ iamɨgali Akaia fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ husivɨ avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi uami. Lɨhavɨci Sɨtefanasɨ dɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ nulɨdɨ nukeŋ hɨji hɨvɨ Asɨ dɨ hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi agɨladɨ ahɨliahuavɨlalɨ uami.
